results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(2n) = 2*a(n), a(A269369(1+n)) = 1 + 2*a(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8191
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(1) = 1, after which for even n, a(n) = 2*a(n/2), for odd n, a(n) = 1 + 2*a(A269370(n)-1).
xref: Related or similar permutations: A269866, A269373, A269376, A270197.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 13 2016
